title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.2 - Accrual requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.2 - Accrual requirement

State Regulations

In order to participate in the excess vacation exchange
program, an employee must have 35 or more days of accumulated vacation credits
at the time of election. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
566.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
